column5: Enjoy a second-floor private room in a lovely home within a beautiful, upscale neighborhood. The second floor includes a full bathroom, second living area, small library and a TV room with several comfy recliners. Guests also have use of the kitchen, laundry room, backyard patio, and community’s walking trails.  Location is just minutes away from Headquarters’ Drive, Dallas North Tollway and Sam Rayburn Tollway-121, and not far from George Bush Tollway-161.
column8: Second-floor private bed with bath and living area
